Dialogue: Tyson: Are you sure no one will be watching the storage room?
Lauren: I’m sure. No one was there when I was scoping it out yesterday.
Emily: I’m still not sure this is a good idea.
Emily: What if we get caught? Do we have a plan for that?
Lauren: We don’t have time to be unsure, Em. Max is dying, he needs antibiotics!
Tyson: The hospital is being strict with the meds. Max is in serious need.
Lauren: Maybe the hospital really is out of antibiotics. In that case then there’s nothing we can do.
Lauren: But there might still be some meds, those could save Max.
Tyson: We’re not going to make you join. But we need you to decide now. Are you in or are you out?
Emily: I’m with you guys. Let’s rob the hospital. I'm in.
